release_note: Bug fixes Support MacOS Sonoma and iOS 17 Fix text rendering glitch when screen size change

Fix cursor moving triggering page exit

This update brings a lot of bug fixes and polishes We ve completely rewrite the sync engine to be faster and more robust Noto now remembers your scroll position for individual notes Fix toolbar sometimes displays at incorrect location after switching app Fix math edit screen toolbar leaving extra white space on iPad Fix text being blurry when connected to an external display that is not HiDPI Polish some transition animations Add ability to exit screens via a downward swipe Polish icons and toolbar UIs Fix touch drawing sometimes triggers page exit transition Improve drawing load time and stutters Fix an issue with Noto using more storage than needed Fix the ability to use user installed fonts
Performance and bug fixes Optimize storage use
Fix sync issues
Fix a crash issue Fix iPad sidebar issue on iOS 15.1
New Icon Improve Text Rendering Engine Batch export Bug fixes
Fix note becomes hidden when dragging on top of another note.
Fix a crash when opening the app.
New database. Improve stability.

Support iOS 15 live scan text feature Text from Camera Add support for attachment editing. Drawing on top image rotate trim video. Draw on top PDF. New editing menus UI Polishes Fix Noto sometimes get stuck on the editing view. Fix move toolbar not displaying in some case Fix List mode text color not adapting to light dark mode Fix some translation issues Fix code language selection view background being transparent Fix code language selection view not scrollable on iOS 15 Fix some UI layout issues Fix crash with displaying some links Fix some other rare crash cases.
Support iOS 15 Fix drawing issue Fix keyboard navigation issue other bug fixes

Add Spell Check Settings Fix Share Extension

Add app Face ID Touch ID lock Add spellcheck Add support for auto sorting checklist Add support for the following markdown syntax enable in settings : bold __bold__ italic _italic_ inlineCode strikethrough underline Add ability to toggle support for markdown header text style Add ability to toggle the visibility of markdown control characters Indent now indents all lines inside a paragraph instead of just inserting a tab character in front of the paragraph New Color Picker Drawing overhaul Drawing are now inserted directly into your notes You are able to draw directly into the drawing canvas on your note Add ability to drag to adjust drawing canvas height New drawing toolbar Update code syntax highlighting to highlight.js 10.0.3 Add shortcuts for New note New folder Preference Photo Library Document Table Math Code BlockQuote Horizontal Rule Drawing Ability to customize shortcut keys on iOS 13.4 macOS 10.15.5 and above Fix microphone being accidentally triggered on Mac when a video is played Fix unable to resize image on macOS Fix macOS blurry text on non retina screens Some performance improvements with video drawing etc

This version is mostly polishes Editor basic RTL language support Sidebar can now stay visible even in portrait mode on iPad More note informations added Creation date Last modification date Character count Make drawings align left again Fix alt left shortcut not working Display last modified date on homescreen Add option to hide date on home screen Add option to adjust drag area Change paragraph drag area to the entire line Better crash tracking Adjust settings menu structure Bug fixes and UI tweaks
Add iPad right click menu UI Tweaks for menus cells Add more diagnostic features What else other than fix bugs

Fix some language input issues Add more appearance options Ability to switch icons Ability to switch light and dark mode theme Ability to change font and font size from Settings Ability to make code block not wrap lines

Noto 2.0.2 Changelog Fix display issue with copying math code block quote horizontal rule within the same note. Noto 2.0 Changelog With Noto 2.0 we made huge changes under the hood. These improvements lays solid foundation for Noto to be taken to the next level. New Features: Noto now sync with CloudKit instead of iCloud drive. Making sync much much faster Noto 1 users will need to import their notes to v2 since the underlying data storage has changed. macOS iOS now shares a universal purchase on iOS 13.4 and macOS 10.15.4 Drag and drop reordering pinning On iPad add swipe the to hide unhide sidebar Noto will now restore to last opened folder and note when opened Code block doesn t wrap lines Updated document scanner to use system provided scanner Math attachment now uses Katex as the rendering engine. Which supports more latex math instructions and new lines New empty notes are automatically deleted Add ability to toggle dark mode independently Add mouse and trackpad support on ipadOS 13.4 Add horizontal rule Add ability to import files and folders by dragging them into Noto s note browser. Supported types include: .md .txt .html .rtf .rtfd .noto .png .jpg .mp4 .mov Various UI Animation tweaks that we lost count Fixes: Fix some crashes and freeze issues Fix italic display for Chinese Fix PDF export on Mac Fix command arrow key short cuts not working Fix not able to undo redo from math block and table cells Fix share extension not able to append to locked note Improve table performance Improve mouse support on macOS Improve long paragraph performance Improve paragraph drag animation Fix cursor jumping to the end when inserting attachment
Fix not able to paste image on mac Fix cursor jump to end of the note when pasting text. Support inline math equations. Fix some syncing issues. Performance improvement with long notes.
Fix Recently Deleted not showing any notes
Add ability to lock encrypt individual notes. of course bug fixes
Fix the issue where moving out of local folder resulted lost notes Fix table cursor jumping problem Able to copy image video Fix incorrect md export text when exporting image and video

Support markdown headers H1 6 Support manually typing number or bullet lists Add keyboard shortcuts Fix bugs and crashes Copy to other apps now copy as markdown Fix bugs and crashes Please update your app to 1.6 on all of your devices. Notes written by 1.6 cannot be displayed on prior versions.
fix the issue where text style doesn t apply fix the issue where floating keyboard causes menu to behave weirdly fix not able to open links without a scheme add back default colors

More folder color More highlight color New code language picker Add ability to change text size via pinch gesture Add ability to convert link preview to text links and vice versa Many bug fixes and polishes
New Noto Share Extension: Easily share files images videos links map location and text into your notes. Support file attachment Support iCloud file sharing Better HTML pdf and jpg export Bug fixes

Latex Math Equation attachment support Block Quote support Recently deleted Pin notes to top Table column resize Image drawing video resize Polish cursor interactions Update homescreen menu Move paragraph drag gesture to the left side of the screen Changed code block from being a paragraph type to an attachment type Performance improvements through out the app especially around large tables Fix drawing sizes when editing from different sizes display Fix table row column action cause data lost Fix image not displaying in exports
fix not being able to make subscription purchases fix the issue where list line gets deleted if there is a space at the end of the line

This new update contains: Ability to add drawing attachment on iOS 13.0 and above Ability to skip intro video Ability to reduce animation wobbly effect Added monthly and yearly subscriptions with trial periods Fixed the crash when tapping Support Feedback button when you don t have a mail account. Various bug fixes Fix app not remembering app purchase state.
